behaviorVariables.json_comment: Influence Factor Weight for preferring higher elevations.
When considering different kinds of attacks, multiply the DFA damage by this value to decide which attack to use.
Influence Factor Weight to control the desire to be inside water.
A weight for an influence factor to prefer to get inside melee range. Negative values will encourage units to get out of melee range.
Influence Factor Weight for standing still when hostiles are in melee range.
Influence Factor Weight to reject being closer than the minimum weapon range to hostiles.
Influence Factor Weight to reject being closer than the minimum weapon range to hostiles WHEN SPRINTING.
